AS-X800 Speed Controller, In-line
branchItem.description: <p>AS-X800 is an all stainless inline speed control model that is well suited for harsh environments.  Its 316 SUS construction permits use in applications where washdown or chemical exposure is a concern.  Additionally, outdoor installations are possible with its -49 to +176<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">°F (-45 to +80</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">°C) operating temperature range.</span></p>
